Sentence: Julian has been pestering Bradley to teach her (Rachel) about Hamlet and arrives one day for a tutorial
By the next morning, she (Rachel) has determined that she (Rachel) loves him (Julian)
Julian later confesses her (Rachel) love to her (Rachel) parents
When Julian sneaks away from her (Rachel) parents' house, she (Rachel) and Bradley meet and leave for his (Bradley) rented cottage

Rachel tells Bradley that Julian left him (Bradley) freely because she (Rachel) learned of Bradley's recent sexual encounter with Rachel -LRB-Rachel had described the encounter in a letter that Arnold delivered-RRB-
